name: YouTube bigger (HD) player for HD videos!
description:
This userstyle enlarges the standard wide player in the new YouTube design.
It is optimized for 720p videos but you can edit the height to 1080px if you want to.

New version for transparent player available:
https://userstyles.org/styles/115676/youtube-bigger-hd-player-for-transparent-player
additional_info:
New version for transparent player available:
https://userstyles.org/styles/115676/youtube-bigger-hd-player-for-transparent-player

Version 1.0.14 (2015-01-02)
- fixed loading bar
- minor improvements

Version 1.0.13 (2014-03-07)
- fixed embedded player (thanks to Hille!)
- fixed scrubber-button at the end of a HTML5 video

Version 1.0.12 (2014-02-21)
- updated for new YouTube centered layout

Version 1.0.11 (2013-11-28)
- fixed HTML5 player image size

Version 1.0.10 (2013-08-21)
- fixed player (removed suffix -legacy because Google removed it either!?)

Version 1.0.9 (2013-08-16)
- fixed player (added suffix -legacy)

Version 1.0.8 (2013-07-19)
- fixed playlist view

Version 1.0.7 (2013-03-21)
- updated for new YouTube HTML layout

Version 1.0.6 (2013-03-09)
- added Youtube - Lights off! support

Version 1.0.5 (2013-02-20)
- fixed playlist overlap

Version 1.0.4 (2013-02-10)
- fixed overlap

Version 1.0.3 (2012-12-07)
- updated 'cause of new YouTube design 

Version 1.0.2
- updated 'cause the player overlays sidebar

Version 1.0.1
- updated 'cause of new YouTube player

Version 1.0.0
- nothing

Do not reshare or sell it. All rights reserved.

discussions.name: Are you able to fix playlists position?
Thank you for keeping it updated, Black Rider!
Scrubber-button stops halfway trough the movie when HTML5 is activated.
The plugin is Outdated - Moves the video out of view [ Chrome and Firefox ]
